title: AK Wall Art Hamster Vinyl Sticker - Car Window Bumper Laptop - Select Size
features: High quality strong outdoor grade vinyl sticker

description: Before installation, clean the surface, peel off the backing and apply. Indoor or outdoor use - printed on all weather outdoor grade vinyl. Great for any flat surface - use on car window & bumper, boat, jet ski, ATV, laptop, snowboard, guitar case, surfboard, wall, etc. Will not peel or fade for 3-5 years or more.
